r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n: ## Tracer ### Fixed - Block signals for sqlsrv_connect function #3035 - Fall back to stderr if the log path contains colons #3044 ## Profiler ### Fixed - PHP 8.4 crash with opcache optimizer #3038 - Crash during preloading with neighboring ZendMM extension #3037
